items.question: What is unique about your closet system?
items.answer:
Modular Closet sections are designed as a semi-custom closet system with a wide range of sizes and options.
This makes it possible to offer the benefit of a custom closet at a fraction of the price.
Each section comes ready to assemble with all components pre-drilled.

items.question: What are the product dimensions?
items.answer:
Our Vista closet modules come in various sizes:

  • Tall Hanging: 18.38" H × 18"-36" W × 14" D
  • Medium Hanging: 36" H × 19.5"-31.5" W × 14" D
  • Double Hanging: 46" H × 18"-36" W × 14" D
  • Hanging Tower: 71.25" H × 19.5"-31.5" W × 14" D
  • Shelf Tower: 71.25" H × 19.5"-31.5" W × 14" D
  • Short Tower: 36" H × 19.5"-31.5" W × 14" D

For complete specifications including internal dimensions, please contact our design team.

items.question: What is the closet depth?
items.answer:
With the exception of our Hutch module, all our closet modules are 14" deep. This depth allows for the best balance between closet space, room space, and reach-in convenience.

We also offer a wardrobe system that is 22" deep, perfect for spaces that do not have a closet.

The drawers' internal dimensions are slightly less than 14" to account for the drawer backing.

items.question: What are these closets made of?
items.answer: Modular Closets are made of 3/4" M-2 grade furniture board, with a high-quality Thermally Fused Laminate (TFL), this technology permanently bonds the laminate to the board using heat not glue. This gives our closets a durable and long lasting finish.

items.question: What colors do you offer?
items.answer:
The Modular Closets systems comes in three color finishes:

  • White
  • Gray
  • Oak

These are high-end colors and are designed to coordinate beautifully with most design color schemes.

items.question: Do you offer products that aren't listed on the website?
items.answer: No. All our products are on our website. Using the available modules, you can create an unlimited amount of full closet designs. If you need help creating a closet design, you can request assistance from a Modular Closets professional designer.

items.question: What modules can have drawers added?
items.answer: All of our tower modules can have drawers added.

items.question: How to get started?
items.answer:
There are 4 ways to get your closet project started.

1. Measure your space and design your closet using Modular Closet Sections.
2. Use our design software to visualize your Modular Closet in your space.
3. Choose one of our pre-designed closet systems that fit your space.
4. Fill out our free design form, and a professional closet designer from our team will design your closet to best suit your needs.

items.question: Can I design my closet myself without expertise or experience?
items.answer: Yes! Our user-friendly design tool makes it easy to design your closet yourself. It has a 3D option to give you a very good idea of what your closet will look like. If you have any trouble using the tool, feel free to take advantage of our free design services.

items.question: How do I use the Modular Closets design tool?
items.answer: If you're still having trouble using the tool, you can chat with a design expert.

items.question: How can I get technical support while using the design tool?
items.answer: You can get live support by calling us at 855-202-2853. You can chat with a design expert to answer your questions. You can email us at support@modularclosets.com. You can submit a form to receive a callback from a professional designer.

items.question: Why isn't the design tool recognizing me if I'm logged in to modularclosets.com?
items.answer: Your log-in for our design tool is separate from the rest of the website. You'll need to log in separately to the design tool.

items.question: How can I access your professional design services?
items.answer:
Give us a call at 855-202-2853.

You can submit a form and one of our professional designers will contact you.

items.question: What can I do with the corners of my closet?
items.answer: Keeping with our values in maximizing home organization and closet space, we sell corner units and corner bridge shelf solution.

items.question: How do I know if the Modular Closets system fits into my closet space?
items.answer:
The standard height for closets in the USA is 84" above the floor.

Our tallest tower can fit into a height of 72" from the floor. You'll need 14" from the door of a reach-in closet for shelving units, and 24" for hanging units.

items.question: What is your warranty policy?
items.answer: Modular Closets stands behind its product and offers a limited lifetime warranty. Please email support@modularclosets.com if you have any issues.

items.question: What's your shipping policy?
items.answer: We ship our products for free anywhere in the continental USA for orders over $2,000. For orders under $2,000 a shipping charge will be added to your order. If you live in Alaska or Hawaii contact support. The only area in Canada that we currently ship to is Ontario Province.

items.question: How long will it take for my order to ship?
items.answer: It generally takes us 5-7 business days to prepare your order. Orders are shipped via UPS, or our freight partners for larger orders. The actual delivery time will vary depending on your location. We manufacture our products in our NJ factory, allowing us to significantly reduce shipping times.

items.question: What is the process for delayed or damaged goods?
items.answer: We stand behind our product and will work tirelessly to ensure you receive your closets in a timely manner. If your order is delayed, contact support for a solution. If your item arrives damaged, please contact our support team for immediate replacement.

items.question: What is Modular Closets' return policy?
items.answer: We take returns on unopened boxes with a 20% restocking fee. The customer is responsible for return shipping fees. Please email support@modularclosets.com to start a return.

items.question: Are there any hidden fees that I'll discover at checkout?
items.answer: Our pricing is simple and transparent. At checkout, you'll pay the listed price plus tax.

items.question: Do you offer installation services?
items.answer: Modular Closets are designed for easy DIY installation. The assembly instructions are very clear and easy to follow. If you need professional installation for your closet you can contact support and we will try and get you in touch with a contractor or partner in your area.

items.question: What tools will I need to install the Modular Closet system?
items.answer:
A drill with a size 2 bit (square)

A level

A stud finder

A phillips screwdriver

items.question: How much time do I need to put aside for installing the modular closet system?
items.answer: It depends on the size of your closet and how handy you are. Since it's wall-mounted with cleats, it can be done one module at a time, and won't take much time out of your day.

items.question: How are your closet systems shipped?
items.answer: Each of our sections come in individual cartons and can be shipped via UPS. Larger orders will ship freight.

items.question: What should I do if my order didn't arrive?
items.answer: Contact support for immediate attention. Have your order number ready when you contact us, we will let you know why your closet didn't arrive yet and when it will arrive. If we can't track it we'll rush out a replacement to make sure you get what you ordered in a timely manner.

items.question: What should I do if my order arrives damaged?
items.answer:
Take a picture of the damage.

Contact support for an expedited replacement.

items.question: What should I do if I get the wrong products?
items.answer: Sometimes the box can look like it contains the wrong module. Contact support to confirm if you have what you ordered. If it's not what you ordered our customer support will immediately send you the proper products.

items.question: Can I make a change or addition to my order?
items.answer: If your order has already shipped we can't make a change without making a return. We won't pay for return shipping, although we may waive the restocking fee. Contact support for assistance. If you ordered within the last 2 days we might be able to add or change the order contact support immediately.

items.question: Where can I find assembly and installation instructions for my closet?
items.answer: Assembly And Installation Link

items.question: Are the sections difficult to assemble?
items.answer: Assembly of our sections is so simple, it takes only ten minutes to assemble with a screwdriver. You can check out our user-friendly assembly guides for more information.

items.question: Are closet systems wall mounted or floor mounted?
items.answer:
Our systems are wall-mounted. Each unit comes with two cleats that get fastened to the wall studs in your closet.

For vista units, we offer legs that can be attached under the tower modules to give it a floor-mounted aesthetic.

Our alto units reach the floor, though they are still mounted on the wall.

items.question: What safety information do I need to know before assembling the unit?
items.answer: Check out our Safety and Assembly Guidelines for important safety information.
